replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
给予玩家带有增大血量上限属性修饰器的装备。

/give @p minecraft:diamond_helmet{AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"generic.maxHealth",Amount:10d,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:-5593294930728296340L, UUIDMost:-666101225043637470L}]}

replies.author: yesu007
replies.txt_content:
理论上NBT可行
先在Player-Attributes下编辑generic.maxHealth标签修改最大生命值
然后返回Player修改HealF标签修改当前生命值
